FondoPalabra.TextoTemporal:
The best workspace for
the international trade community.
FondoPalabra.TextoPublicada:
The best workspace for
the international trade community.

Titulo.TextoTemporal:
Come and know the ideal space to make
your business more efficient.
Titulo.TextoPublicada:
Come and know the ideal space to make
your business more efficient.

SubContent1.TextoTemporal: We have 100% workspaces implemented and designed for your operation. Come and reserve your space in the first international trade community in the country.
SubContent1.TextoPublicada: We have 100% workspaces implemented and designed for your operation. Come and reserve your space in the first international trade community in the country.

SubContent2.TextoTemporal: We have meeting rooms, training rooms and a directory room designed to have the best work experience with your team and your clients.
SubContent2.TextoPublicada: We have meeting rooms, training rooms and a directory room designed to have the best work experience with your team and your clients.

ComunidadContent.TextoTemporal: We seek to provide the ideal space for our clients to increase their business opportunities in community, optimize their operations and together share best practices for success in international trade
ComunidadContent.TextoPublicada: We seek to provide the ideal space for our clients to increase their business opportunities in community, optimize their operations and together share best practices for success in international trade

BeneficioSubContent1.TextoTemporal: We are in Lima Cargo City, a privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp.
BeneficioSubContent1.TextoPublicada: We are in Lima Cargo City, a privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp.

BeneficioSubContent2.TextoTemporal: LCC Espacios will allow you to expand your network of contacts and interact with the main actors in international trade, such as freight agencies, customs, exporters, importers, certifiers, importers, certifiers, financial institutions and others.
BeneficioSubContent2.TextoPublicada: LCC Espacios will allow you to expand your network of contacts and interact with the main actors in international trade, such as freight agencies, customs, exporters, importers, certifiers, importers, certifiers, financial institutions and others.

BeneficioSubContent3.TextoTemporal: Our privileged location allows us to interact with companies that provide cargo service, such as TALMA, SENASA, SNI, BBVA, BCP, among others. Also with companies that have developed businesses in Lima Cargo City due to the strategic location.
BeneficioSubContent3.TextoPublicada: Our privileged location allows us to interact with companies that provide cargo service, such as TALMA, SENASA, SNI, BBVA, BCP, among others. Also with companies that have developed businesses in Lima Cargo City due to the strategic location.

BeneficioSubContent4.TextoTemporal: We integrate the main operators of the international trade chain in one place: airlines, cargo terminals, freight consolidating agents, customs agencies and government entities.
BeneficioSubContent4.TextoPublicada: We integrate the main operators of the international trade chain in one place: airlines, cargo terminals, freight consolidating agents, customs agencies and government entities.

CiudadTitulo.TextoTemporal: Find us in Lima Cargo City
CiudadTitulo.TextoPublicada: Find us in Lima Cargo City

CiudadContent.TextoTemporal: A privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp, where you can streamline your operations and interact with the main foreign trade operators.
CiudadContent.TextoPublicada: A privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp, where you can streamline your operations and interact with the main foreign trade operators.

CiudadSubTitulo.TextoTemporal: Companies that are part of LCC
CiudadSubTitulo.TextoPublicada: Companies that are part of LCC

Titulo.TextoTemporal: Choose the best option according to your needs and the size of your team.
Titulo.TextoPublicada: Choose the best option according to your needs and the size of your team.

SubContent1.TextoTemporal: We have large desks in shared areas that will allow you to interact with other full-time sector teams, so you can expand your network of contacts and generate business.
SubContent1.TextoPublicada: We have large desks in shared areas that will allow you to interact with other full-time sector teams, so you can expand your network of contacts and generate business.

SubContent2.TextoTemporal: We have a private office from 1 working position, with all services included and equipped for the comfort of your day to day, which allow you to share with your team full time 24/7.
SubContent2.TextoPublicada: We have a private office from 1 working position, with all services included and equipped for the comfort of your day to day, which allow you to share with your team full time 24/7.

SubContent3.TextoTemporal: We have large desks in shared areas which allow you to interact with companies in the sector full time, so you can expand your network of contacts and generate business.
SubContent3.TextoPublicada: We have large desks in shared areas which allow you to interact with companies in the sector full time, so you can expand your network of contacts and generate business.

InvitamosTitulo.TextoTemporal: We invite you to know our workspaces, schedule a tour!
InvitamosTitulo.TextoPublicada: We invite you to know our workspaces, schedule a tour!

PreguntasRespuesta1.TextoTemporal: We have staff for attention at the following times: Monday to Friday: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm Saturdays: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm.
PreguntasRespuesta1.TextoPublicada: We have staff for attention at the following times: Monday to Friday: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm Saturdays: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm.

PreguntasRespuesta2.TextoTemporal:
• 24/7 access
• Credits for meeting room use
• Color and b/w prints
• Fiber optic internet
• Safety, maintenance and cleaning
• Unlimited coffee
• Lockers zone
• Use of common areas
PreguntasRespuesta2.TextoPublicada:
• 24/7 access
• Credits for meeting room use
• Color and b/w prints
• Fiber optic internet
• Safety, maintenance and cleaning
• Unlimited coffee
• Lockers zone
• Use of common areas

PreguntasSubtitulo3.TextoTemporal: Who will be responsible for cleaning the office?
PreguntasSubtitulo3.TextoPublicada: Who will be responsible for cleaning the office?

PreguntasRespuesta3.TextoTemporal: We have cleaning staff at your disposal during your work hours.
PreguntasRespuesta3.TextoPublicada: We have cleaning staff at your disposal during your work hours.

PreguntasRespuesta4.TextoTemporal: Yes, we have 24/7 security staff and internal cameras.
PreguntasRespuesta4.TextoPublicada: Yes, we have 24/7 security staff and internal cameras.

PreguntasRespuesta5.TextoTemporal: They can receive visitors during office hours.
PreguntasRespuesta5.TextoPublicada: They can receive visitors during office hours.

PreguntasSubtitulo6.TextoTemporal: Do you have the reception service?
PreguntasSubtitulo6.TextoPublicada: Do you have the reception service?

PreguntasRespuesta6.TextoTemporal: You can count on our office manager from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm.
PreguntasRespuesta6.TextoPublicada: You can count on our office manager from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm.

Titulo.TextoTemporal: We have meeting and training rooms designed for the best work experience.
Titulo.TextoPublicada: We have meeting and training rooms designed for the best work experience.

SubContent1.TextoTemporal: Our rooms are designed for board meetings and / or executive presentations, with your work team or clients. We have a wireless connection system that will allow you to project your presentations in a more dynamic way.
SubContent1.TextoPublicada: Our rooms are designed for board meetings and / or executive presentations, with your work team or clients. We have a wireless connection system that will allow you to project your presentations in a more dynamic way.

SubContent2.TextoTemporal: We have large training rooms with capacity for 30 to 42 people with Airtame technology for projection of your presentations. The rooms also have work boards for courses and / or workshops.
SubContent2.TextoPublicada: We have large training rooms with capacity for 30 to 42 people with Airtame technology for projection of your presentations. The rooms also have work boards for courses and / or workshops.

InvitamosTitulo.TextoTemporal: We invite you to know our workspaces, schedule a tour!
InvitamosTitulo.TextoPublicada: We invite you to know our workspaces, schedule a tour!

PreguntasRespuesta1.TextoTemporal: The rooms have acrylic boards, smart TV with which you can make any digital presentation by connecting your equipment or devices.
PreguntasRespuesta1.TextoPublicada: The rooms have acrylic boards, smart TV with which you can make any digital presentation by connecting your equipment or devices.

PreguntasRespuesta2.TextoTemporal: We have staff for attention at the following times: Monday to Friday: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm Saturdays: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm.
PreguntasRespuesta2.TextoPublicada: We have staff for attention at the following times: Monday to Friday: 7:00 am to 10:00 pm Saturdays: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm.

PreguntasRespuesta3.TextoTemporal: We have rooms of 30 and 42 people.
PreguntasRespuesta3.TextoPublicada: We have rooms of 30 and 42 people.

PreguntasRespuesta4.TextoTemporal: The rental of the rooms will allow them to have access to the loungue area, where they can have free coffee, water and infusions.
PreguntasRespuesta4.TextoPublicada: The rental of the rooms will allow them to have access to the loungue area, where they can have free coffee, water and infusions.

Comunidad1TituloContent.TextoTemporal: We offer you the ideal space to work efficiently in your logistics and commercial operations.
Comunidad1TituloContent.TextoPublicada: We offer you the ideal space to work efficiently in your logistics and commercial operations.

Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent1.TextoTemporal: We are in Lima Cargo City, a privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp.
Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent1.TextoPublicada: We are in Lima Cargo City, a privileged position with direct connection to the Jorge Chávez International Airport ramp.

Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent2.TextoTemporal: We provide you with all the necessary services for the optimization of your operations for only one monthly payment. The synergy of collaborative spaces has a positive impact on your costs.
Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent2.TextoPublicada: We provide you with all the necessary services for the optimization of your operations for only one monthly payment. The synergy of collaborative spaces has a positive impact on your costs.

Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent3.TextoTemporal: Your workspace will be available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.
Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent3.TextoPublicada: Your workspace will be available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent4.TextoTemporal: Safe spaces with highly qualified and trained employees. We have a network of dome cameras linked to the Lima Cargo City control center, which allow us to have a complete view of both your offices and the entire complex.
Comunidad1BeneficioSubContent4.TextoPublicada: Safe spaces with highly qualified and trained employees. We have a network of dome cameras linked to the Lima Cargo City control center, which allow us to have a complete view of both your offices and the entire complex.

Comunidad3SubContent1.TextoTemporal: We provide you with the right space to develop your personal projects, network and interact with the main operators of international trade, without worrying about the costs of having your own office.
Comunidad3SubContent1.TextoPublicada: We provide you with the right space to develop your personal projects, network and interact with the main operators of international trade, without worrying about the costs of having your own office.

Comunidad3SubContent2.TextoTemporal: Develop your business with a backup corporate image, where you can receive your customers or meet with your team.
Comunidad3SubContent2.TextoPublicada: Develop your business with a backup corporate image, where you can receive your customers or meet with your team.

Comunidad3SubContent3.TextoTemporal: It is part of the main business center in the best strategic location of Callao, in a comfortable, safe and flexible environment.

TituloContent.TextoTemporal: We are inspired by the greatness of our country, and its generous act of sharing our wealth with the world. We are inspired by the dedication of the community of exporters who take care of every detail of the export process to guarantee the arrival of their products at their destination. We are inspired to be part of the growth of our community.
TituloContent.TextoPublicada: We are inspired by the greatness of our country, and its generous act of sharing our wealth with the world. We are inspired by the dedication of the community of exporters who take care of every detail of the export process to guarantee the arrival of their products at their destination. We are inspired to be part of the growth of our community.

SubContent1.TextoTemporal:
We are LCC spaces, the place where international trade actors expand their chances of success.

We exist, because we believe in the development of our country and therefore we are committed to building the community that makes it possible.

Here you will find a way to reach more people and more destinations safely and without delay.
